data.title: SiSB – Udruga studenata biologije – BIUS
data.text:
The Symposium of Biology Students, known as SiSB, is an international event hosted by the Biology Department of the Faculty of Science in Zagreb. This two-day symposium aims to unite biology enthusiasts of all ages and backgrounds to share knowledge and ideas from various branches and disciplines of biology. SiSB provides an unique platform for students to showcase their research, network with peers, form new connections, and discover innovative concepts that promote biology as a science.

To keep up with the latest information about applications and other news, visit our Instagram and Facebook accounts, or reach out to us via e-mail (sisbstudent@gmail.com).

Program of SiSB 2024

Abstract book

You can view the SiSB 2024 abstract book HERE!

Sponsors and donators:

GOLD SPONSORS

JANAF

JADRANSKI NAFTOVOD, dioničko društvo (JANAF Plc.), with its registered office in Zagreb, Republic of Croatia, manages an oil pipeline and storage system as a modern, efficacious and cost-efficient system of crude oil transportation and the storage of crude oil and petroleum products.

By constructing and putting into operation the oil pipeline and storage system (1979) JANAF has become a strategically significant factor of supply security of the refineries in six countries of South Eastern and Central Europe, and today, is recognized as the EU strategic oil pipeline.

Besides crude oil transportation, JANAF’s core business includes storage of crude oil and petroleum products.

Mission

To continuously improve security and efficiency of crude oil transportation and storage of crude oil and petroleum products by applying the world’s highest technological standards while preserving and protecting the environment alongside with taking care of the safety and human potential development.

Vision

To implement new projects related to transportation and storage of crude oil and petroleum products, as well as non-oil activities that will ensure the Company’s further growth and successful performance, enhancement of energy supply security of the Republic of Croatia, the EU Member States and South Eastern Europe, economic development of local communities and the Republic of Croatia and implementation of development strategies of low-carbon economy and energy.

OIKON

OIKON Ltd – Institute of Applied Ecology is a leading licensed and accredited consulting company / research institute in the field of applied ecology in Croatia and the region with 26 years of experience. Oikon’s specialties are nature and environmental protection, natural resource management, landscape analysis and design, industrial ecology, ecological modelling, renewable energy, sustainable mobility, environmental law, policy and economics, project management, remote sensing and geographic information systems (GIS).

Such a broad range of activities requires a broad range of expertise. Oikon employs experts covering as many as 20 disciplines, including biologists and ecologists, and nearly a quarter of the staff are PhDs. They all regularly attend training and seminars, use modern, state-of-the-art, professional and specialized equipment, hardware and software, and apply innovative and often groundbreaking approaches to successfully conduct sophisticated research and provide highly professional services to clients.

Oikon also has extensive experience abroad and collaborates with leading consulting firms throughout Europe. The company has extended its expertise beyond Croatia with offices in Ljubljana and Dubai. OIKON SI Ltd. in Slovenia OIKON MEA Ltd. covering the Middle East and Africa, both focus on delivering sustainable development services and environmentally friendly solutions, particularly in the field of renewable energy.

More information: https://oikon.hr/

Oikon is also active on social networks:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OikonLtd

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oikon_ltd/

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/oikon-institute-of-applied-technology/

LNG

LNG CROATIA LLC performs regulated energy activity of managing the LNG terminal and is responsible for the operation, maintenance, and development of LNG terminal.

The LNG terminal on the island of Krk aims to ensure the fulfilment of the energy needs of Central and Southeast European countries and increase security of supply through a new natural gas supply route

Mission

As the operator of the LNG terminal, LNG Croatia LLC is responsible for the management, maintenance and development of safe, reliable and efficient operation of the terminal while ensuring quality service of unloading and send-out of LNG to all users in a non-discriminatory, transparent and reliable manner, while paying attention to work efficiency and also to nature and environment protection.

Vision

LNG CROATIA LLC strives to be a well-respected and leading provider of services on the gas energy market in the Republic of Croatia and strengthen the position of an important strategic energy partner in the region and the EU, which is achieved in a transparent and socially responsible way, meeting the needs of its users and the interests of its owners.

MEĐIMURJE PLIN

The company MEĐIMURJE-PLIN d.o.o. was founded in 1974, and has been your reliable partner ever since. The headquarters of the company is in Čakovec, Obrtnička 4. The main activity of the company is the supply of natural gas to customers throughout the Republic of Croatia, where it supplies households and businesses. MEĐIMURJE-PLIN has a proven team available 24 hours a day for all customers and if you want or need an offer, contact our team. In addition, MEĐIMURJE-PLIN d.o.o. performs the activity of gas distribution and services of testing gas installations. All these jobs are performed by 75 workers.

SILVER SPONSORS

COMPING

Comping is a technology-driven company founded on the knowledge excellence of our experts and constant orientation to business innovation.

We combine consulting with technology to provide the best experiences for our clients. From back-end integration solutions, through digitalization of processes to innovative business models based on data analytics.

Our teams are made up of some of the most experienced industry experts who work in multidisciplinary teams creating digital solutions tailored to the needs of our clients.

ŠKOLSKA KNJIGA

Školska knjiga is a renowned brand in Croatian publishing, bringing together the most respected editorial and author teams from science, education, and culture. It is the initiator and holder of numerous national projects, including textbooks, professional and scientific works, and lexicography books, as well as fine literature, children’s books, magazines, and other valuable publications.

At the same time, its contemporary publishing program follows the global trends in publishing while integrating it with traditional, national cultural values.

Through its well-known textbooks and high-quality educational editions, Školska knjiga aims to educate new generations. Recognizing the importance of support throughout the educational system, Školska knjiga has also introduced numerous innovations to assist in the preparation and delivery of classes.

BIOM

Association Biom is a civil society organization that works to conserve, promote, and popularize nature. Founded in 2006 by a small group of passionate biologists, Biom now employs 26 people, has 200 members, and more than 100 volunteers who work together to conserve nature in Croatia. In order to address the current issues of habitat and biodiversity loss, Biom engages in a variety of activities, such as biological research, the implementation of direct conservation measures, suppression of crimes against nature like poisoning and poaching, advocacy of stronger legislation for nature conservation, and many more. A significant aspect of Biom’s activity is implementing educational programs and organising volunteer events and camps, which brings together a committed community that actively works for the benefit of nature and society.

PLITVIČKA JEZERA

Plitvice Lakes is the oldest and largest national park in the Republic of Croatia. The park is situated in the mountainous region of Croatia. The park is primarily covered in forest vegetation, with smaller areas under grasslands. The most attractive part of the park – the lakes – cover just under 1% of the total park area.

The lake system is comprised of 16 named and several smaller unnamed lakes, cascading one into the next. Due to the geological substrate and characteristic hydrogeological conditions, the lake system has been divided into the Upper and Lower lakes.

With its exceptional natural beauty, this area has always attracted nature lovers, and already on 8 April 1949, it was proclaimed Croatia’s first national park. The process of tufa formation, which results in the building of the tufa, or travertine, barriers and resulted in the creation of the lakes, is the outstanding universal value, for which the Plitvice Lakes were internationally recognised on 26 October 1979 with their inscription onto the UNESCO World Heritage List. In 1997, the boundaries of the national park were expanded, and today it covers an area just under 300 km2.

BRONZE SPONSORS

ERSTE

When you are a student, you need an account for 0 euros!

It doesn’t matter what you study, whether you work occasionally or more often, it’s important that you open an Erste current account for youngsters for your financial independence.

For 0 euros in Erste Bank, you get a current account for youngsters, a contactless Visa debit card and online banking George, and you can sign for everything 100% digitally. Just download George application to your phone and do it in a few clicks.

If you still want to come to the bank, you can always stop by the Erste branch for youngsters at Tratinska 1 in Zagreb or any other Erste branch.

Erste bank has a lot more in store for you. Click on www.erstebank.hr and find out everything you are interested in.

ODRAZ

ODRAZ – Sustainable Community Development is an independent civil society, non-profit organization gathering professionals from various fields, which design and apply sustainable development concepts for benefit of local communities

ODRAZ encourage and implement changes leading towards sustainability, operating at various levels, from local to national and international. It cooperates with civil society organisations, public, professional and business organisations, networks and experts. Many collaborators and volunteers take part in its activities, in addition to employees.
